greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of maximal-sized antichains in divisor lattice D(n).
comment: The divisor lattice D(n) is the lattice of the divisors of the natural number n.
link: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: R.<t> = QQ[]; mults = [x[1] for x in factor(n)]
maxsize = prod((t^(m+1)-1)//(t-1) for m in mults)[sum(mults)//2]
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Aug 17 2004
ext: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, May 13 2013
